name: Crown of Kings
description:
Crown of Kings is a free to play strategy game and tower defense in one. Created by one indie developer. The creative process lasted over a year.

Game features:
- Build your kingdom and manage it wisely
- Earn gold and resources needed for development
- Create a powerful army and conquer nearby kingdoms
- Randomly generated battlefields for never ending fun
- Craft armor, swords and invest in your army
- Command directly in clashes
- Cast destructive spells on your enemies

The game has no hidden fees, loot boxes or battle passes. The game contains an advertisement that advertises support for me with a drop amount to allow me to develop the game further.
